resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d170b3-5e80-4549-2655-d46b0d60d695#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Trónoló Krisztus, VI. század közepe, Ravenna, San Vitale, Mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">The sitting enthroned Christ, middle of 6th century, Ravenna San Vitale, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Sitting inthronisierte Christ, Mitte des 6. 
Jahrhunderts, Ravenna San Vitale, Mosaik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ couronné par séance, milieu de 6ème 
siècle, Ravenne San Vitale, mosaïque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Christ enthroned assento, meio do õ século, 
Ravenna San Vitale, mosaic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Christ enthroned seduta, metà del sesto 
secolo, Ravenna San Vitale, mosaico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συνεδρίαση Χριστός, τα μέσα του 6ου αιώνα, Ραβένα 
SAN Vitale, μωσαϊκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cristo enthroned sentada, centro del 6to siglo,
Ravena San Vitale, mosaico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">San Vitale mozaikja a Trónoló Krisztussal.</string>
            <string language="en">mosaic of San vitale with the sitting enthroned Christ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Maiestas Domini,  trónoló Krisztus,  Ravenna,  bizánci művészet,  San Vitale,  </string>
            <string language="en">Maiestas Domini, sitting enthroned Christ, Ravenna, byzantine art, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mosaik von San vitale mit dem Sitting 
inthronisierten Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mosaïque de vitale de San avec le Christ 
couronné par séance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mosaic do vitale do San com o Christ enthroned 
assento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il mosaico del vitale di San con la seduta 
enthroned Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το μωσαϊκό του SAN vitale με τη συνεδρίαση 
Χριστός</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el mosaico del vitale del San con la sentada 
enthroned a Cristo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maiestas Domini, sitzender inthronisierter Christ, 
Ravenna, byzantinische kunst, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maiestas Domini, le Christ couronné s'asseyant, 
Ravenne, art bizantin, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maiestas Domini, Christ enthroned sentando-se, Ravenna,
arte byzantine, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Maiestas Domini, sedentesi enthroned Christ, Ravenna, 
l'arte byzantine, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Maiestas Domini, κάθισμα Χριστός, Ραβένα, βυζαντινή
τέχνη, SAN Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Maiestas Domini, sentándose enthroned a Cristo, Ravena,
arte byzantine, San Vitale</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
